meanings.definition: Having the form of a vessel or tube.
meanings.sent1: The vasiform container held the flowers perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The long, vasiform tube allowed water to flow smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The vasiform vase looked like a tall, skinny alien.
meanings.sent4: Her vasiform thoughts flowed endlessly like a winding river.
meanings.sent5: The vasiform shape of the tunnel made it easy to navigate.

meanings.definition: Resembling a vase in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The vasiform flowers added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The vasiform structure of the building was striking.
meanings.sent3: She wore a vasiform hat that made her look taller.
meanings.sent4: The vasiform clouds in the sky resembled giant vases.
meanings.sent5: The vasiform design of the lamp made it unique.
